thread.title: View Intimate Impressionism from the National Gallery of Art with Four Seasons Hotel SeattleTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: View Intimate Impressionism from the National Gallery of Art with Four Seasons Hotel SeattleTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: View Intimate Impressionism from the National Gallery of Art with Four Seasons Hotel SeattleTravelandtourworld.com
text:
View Intimate Impressionism from the National Gallery of Art with Four Seasons Hotel Seattle Published on : Tuesday, October 6, 2015
Located across the street from Four Seasons Hotel Seattle, the Seattle Art Museum is presenting Intimate Impressionism from the National Gallery of Art Experience the exhibit with Four Seasons with two VIP tickets to the exhibit, luxurious overnight accommodations, an Impressionism-themed amenity, and an Impressionism exhibit catalogue. The Intimate Impressionism package is available through January 9, 2016.
This exhibition will feature 68 intimately scaled paintings by Impressionist and Post-Impressionist masters, including Edouard Manet, Auguste Renoir, Claude Monet, Eugène Boudin, Paul Cézanne, Edgar Degas, Camille Pissarro, Pierre Bonnard, Edouard Vuillard, Paul Gauguin and Vincent van Gogh, among others. These works, which are prominently presented in the East Building of the National Gallery, have long been treasured by the museum’s visitors and prized by art historians.
This will be the first time the collection has gone on tour and it is only because the East Wing will be closed for renovation. For more information on the exhibit visit SAM online or use the hashtag #SAMImpressionism.
Four Seasons Hotel Seattle is the only Forbes Travel Guide Five-Star hotel in Washington state and one of 97 hotels in the world who received the highest recognition for service and amenities.
Source:-Four Seasons
